评论详情: After two weeks this lovely ring turned colors. Tarnished
It’s advertised being 925 but there is no markings so buyers beware

I barely had this a week and I took a shower and scrubbed my finger vigorously so it’s not nearly as dark as it was but I didn’t wash my finger with it or take a shower with it and it turned my finger dark and green. I take showers and wash my hands with all my other rings which are sterling silver which some I’ve had over 10 years and haven’t even had to polish them and I purchased this on the 25th of April and I’m already returning it on the 1st of May. DO NOT purchase this and before you ask, no I’m not allergic to other metals and even if I was this was supposed to be .925 Sterling and it is STAMPED inside saying that it is.
